title: D.C. protesters say they were attacked by guards of Azerbaijani president
summary_full: Azerbaijan’s Ilham Aliyev is in town for a meeting of Trump’s Board of Peace. Police said an incident that “involved Azerbaijan security guards” had been referred to the State Department.
summary_public: Azerbaijan’s Ilham Aliyev is in town for a meeting of Trump’s Board of Peace. Police said an incident that “involved Azerbaijan security guards” had been referred to the State Department.

AZ.label: negative
AZ.evidence: attacked by guards of Azerbaijani president
